data.name: A.I.T.W
data.detailed_description: The city is destroyed, a virus infected people, a cybernetic  army is trying to take over the united states , and your character Jack Hardaman is the one to end it all . This light/simple Cheesy FPS lets you: Take down monsters, zombies, and different enemy factions, with a very Minimal story (best with headphones)that takes up to 4 hours to complete, save allies and they might join you, pilfer enemy's, cars, & chest, use weapons placed for you around the levels or see The merchant for his goods, use your grapple hook to reach places jack cant normally jump to, unleash the power of rupture and pressure blast on your foes, play a honest tutorial on how every thing works, find Money chest to boost your score & fight some pretty cool bosses. did you beat the game? play 4 survival maps Playground, Flood Zone, Underground City & The Club and survive till the timer reaches 0.
data.about_the_game: The city is destroyed, a virus infected people, a cybernetic  army is trying to take over the united states , and your character Jack Hardaman is the one to end it all . This light/simple Cheesy FPS lets you: Take down monsters, zombies, and different enemy factions, with a very Minimal story (best with headphones)that takes up to 4 hours to complete, save allies and they might join you, pilfer enemy's, cars, & chest, use weapons placed for you around the levels or see The merchant for his goods, use your grapple hook to reach places jack cant normally jump to, unleash the power of rupture and pressure blast on your foes, play a honest tutorial on how every thing works, find Money chest to boost your score & fight some pretty cool bosses. did you beat the game? play 4 survival maps Playground, Flood Zone, Underground City & The Club and survive till the timer reaches 0.
data.short_description: Play a light FPS with little story up to 4 hours & collect items, cool weapons or see The merchant, use your ability's & grapple hook to destroy your foes and reach high areas, stop a cybernetic army and other enemy factions, play 4 onslaught maps.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-8100 CPU @ 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 630
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen Threadripper 2950X Processor (16x 3.5GHZ/32MB L3 Cache)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 - 8GB GDDR6
